column2: caption="Frodo Gamgee" from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]''

column1: '''Frodo Gardner''' was the second child and eldest son of [[Samwise Gamgee]] and [[Rose Cotton]].<ref name="Gamgee"/>
It was always Sam's intention to name one of his children after his best friend, [[Frodo Baggins]]. Though his first child was [[Elanor Gardner
column2: a girl]], he named the second one Frodo.<ref name="Grey"/>

column1: Frodo became the head of [[Gardner Family]] and inherited [[Bag End]]. His son was [[Holfast Gardner]].<ref name="Gamgee"/>

column2: King Elessar]] mentions his name in [[Sindarin]] as ''Iorhael''.<ref>{{SD

column1: '''2009''': ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]'':'''

:Frodo Gamgee is the main playable character. He runs around [[Hobbiton]] completing tasks and talking to characters, whilst also re-living the Aragorn's adventures (as retold) by Sam. When sitting down with his father, the player can control Aragorn in a fairy tale-like setting.
